name: Reverse EZ Bar Cable Curls
how_to_perform:
1. Start by standing facing a cable machine with the handle set to chest height.
2. Grasp the EZ bar with both hands, ensuring your palms are facing forward (towards you).
3. Keeping your upper arms stationary, bend your elbows and allow your forearms to move upwards towards your shoulders.
4. Focus on curling your biceps while keeping your upper arms still.
5. Slowly lower the EZ bar back to the starting position by extending your forearms and returning to a straight arm position.
6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, ensuring you maintain a controlled movement throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Reverse EZ Bar Cable Curls are an isolation exercise targeting the biceps, performed using a cable machine with an EZ bar handle.
